title: Chromebooks could be getting ultra-wideband (UWB) in the future

description: Android 14 is getting a bit more close to stable today.

title: PSA: Your smartwatch band may have dangerous bacteria on it
description: 95% of the smartwatch bands were found to be contaminated with dangerous bacteria.

title: We asked, you told us: You’ve almost completely switched to USB-C
description: It seems like all your gadgets and accessories have a USB-C port, with some exceptions.

description: Would you buy a phone with a bezel-free screen? It seems like Samsung Display thinks so.

title: Samsung could lose to Apple for the first time ever in annual phone shipments

title: What is an SSD’s TBW rating and why does it matter?

title: From 200MP to 440MP: Samsung could be working on crazy camera sensors
description: It's unclear if the 440MP sensor is destined for smartphones, but it would be in line with Samsung's long-term ambitions.

title: Apple could discontinue its iconic leather case starting with the iPhone 15
description: The leather iPhone case first appeared in 2013 with the iPhone 5s.

title: The Moto G54 5G could be the budget camera phone to watch out for
description: It's predecessor, the Moto G53 5G, was a decent camera phone for $200, and the Moto G54 5G could follow the same trends.

title: T-Mobile’s first Revvl tablet dukes it out with Amazon and Samsung’s cheap tabs

title: Google Messages preparing to add support for emergency SOS over satellite
description: There's still no clarity on which devices will support satellite connectivity with Android 14.
